A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: First time around I really wasn't sure\, but on a second viewing\, when I got over the excitement of another Star Wars movie\, I was really impressed. I think it will stick with me (in a good way) for longer than The Force Awakens. Certainly one of the most emotionally resonant of the saga.\n\nWe could definitely do with less star / director cameos in future SW movies\, though.
